content: ***find this pattern as a free download from hobbii on september 1 2023*** when one color won t do use all of them the checked out blanket makes the most of your perfectly hand-picked palette by letting each color shine build your blanket by connecting join-as-you-go tunisian crochet panels in the iconic honeycomb stitch pattern each added panel gets you closer to cozy bliss add playful twisted tassels in a contrasting color for the perfect finish **yarn used ** hobbii happy place dk weight #3 50% wool 50% cotton 273 yards per 100g skein a 21 solid 210 yards 1 skein b 21 melange 210 yards 1 skein c 25 solid 210yards 1 skein d 25 melange 210 yards 1 skein e 34 solid 210 yards 1 skein f 34 melange 210 yards 1 skein g 35 solid 210yards 1 skein h 35 melange 210 yards 1 skein i 06 solid 210 yards 1 skein j 06 melange 210 yards 1 skein ac 02 melange 270 yards 1 skein join the happy place vip email list for exclusive details deals and giveaways - link 1 1 https //link brands mvk co/ac5f8e7
